title: Kafka papers and presentations - Apache Kafka - Apache Software Foundation

Blog Posts
Kafka Streams - Not Looking at Facebook
, by Timothy Renner, Aug 2016
Describes an (imaginary) app that monitors user behavior and notifies users when they are not looking at Facebook
Processing Tweets with Kafka Streams
, August 2016
Describes implementing a stream processing application in Scala that processes tweets (windowed wordcount).  Uses docker to containerize the app.
Applying Kafka Streams for internal message delivery pipeline
, blog post by
LINE Corp.
, August 2016
Describes the use of Kafka Streams (and Kafka) in production at LINE for processing 1+ million msg/s.  As of 2016 LINE has 220+ million active monthly users.
